title: Interactive Multimedia-Based Language Courseware for English Proficiency Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or higher English comprehension and foundational job-related vocabulary
context.additional_context: Need for interface design optimized for smartphone-based learning. Flexible scheduling for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners must understand and express English conversational situations occurring in real-life and workplace contexts with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners will autonomously perform topic-expansion learning using hypertext-based learning modules.
Learners will apply listening strategies reflecting real cultural contexts through interactive video content.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
